review: I visited the DYU center for urinary leakage issues, she recommended  Emsella chair treatment, it helped me a lot. I recommended one of my family members for IVF treatment with her and she got a healthy baby after taking treatment. Thanks a lot to Dr Jyoti Bandi and the DYU team. I would like to recommend all my friends and family members.
We visited DYU IVF center at HSR layout we met Dr.jyoti bandi was very humble and all the staffs are approachable . overall we are very happy to refer and one step solution.
